thread.title: Schools Ministry Group
thread.title_full: Flashbay reviewed by Schools Ministry Group

author: Schools Ministry Group
title: Schools Ministry Group
text: Flashbay staff were attentive, friendly and flexible. The product we chose looks fantastic, we are more than happy with the look of the product and the price. The order process was easy and fast. I can't wait for our conference attendees to receive their product!
